member.summary: Gets a list of amount changes of specified user's account
member.param: The id of the account to get the balances for
Far point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 1 hour. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Near point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 1 hour. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Maximum number of items in each response (from 1 to 500, default is 100)

member.summary: Gets a list of amount changes of specified user's account
member.param: The id of the account to get the balances for
Far point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 1 hour. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Near point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 1 hour. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Maximum number of items in each response (from 1 to 500, default is 100)

member.summary: This endpoint returns the amount changes of specified user's account.
member.param: The id of the account to get the ledger for
Far point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 10 days. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Near point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 10 days. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Maximum number of items in each response (from 1 to 500, default is 100)
Only get orders with ID before or after this. Used together with the direction parameter

member.summary: This endpoint returns the amount changes of specified user's account.
member.param: The id of the account to get the ledger for
Far point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 10 days. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Near point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 10 days. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Maximum number of items in each response (from 1 to 500, default is 100)
Only get orders with ID before or after this. Used together with the direction parameter

member.summary: The limit price of limit order

member.summary: The source where the order was triggered, possible values: sys, web, api, app

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.HuobiOrderTrade.Role
member.summary: The role in the transaction: taker or maker

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.HuobiOrderTrade.FeeCurrency
member.summary: Currency of transaction fee or transaction fee rebate (transaction fee of buy order is based on base currency, transaction fee of sell order is based on quote currency; transaction fee rebate of buy order is based on quote currency, transaction fee rebate of sell order is based on base currency)

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.HuobiOrderUpdate.AccountId
member.summary: The id of the account that placed the order

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.HuobiOrderUpdate.CreatedAt
member.summary: The time the order was created

member.summary: The amount of the order that is filled

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.HuobiOrderUpdate.FilledFees
member.summary: The amount of fees paid for the filled amount

member.summary: The precision of the price in decimal numbers

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.WithdrawDeposit.Type
member.summary: Define transfer type to search, possible values: [deposit, withdraw]

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.WithdrawDeposit.Amount
member.summary: The number of crypto asset transfered in its minimum unit

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.WithdrawDeposit.Address
member.summary: The deposit or withdraw target address

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.WithdrawDeposit.ErrorCode
member.summary: Error code for withdrawal failure, only returned when the type is "withdraw" and the state is "reject", "wallet-reject" and "failed".

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.WithdrawDeposit.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Error description of withdrawal failure, only returned when the type is "withdraw" and the state is "reject", "wallet-reject" and "failed".

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.WithdrawDeposit.CreatedAt
member.summary: The timestamp in milliseconds for the transfer creation

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Objects.WithdrawDeposit.UpdatedAt
member.summary: The timestamp in milliseconds for the transfer's latest update
